name: MView
short_description:
MView extracts the results of a sequence database search (BLAST, FASTA, etc) or a multiple alignment (CLUSTAL, MSF, etc), optionally adding HTML markup to control colouring and web page layout.

It can also be used to extract and convert searches or alignments to other formats:

Input:
- Sequence database search: BLAST, WashU-BLAST, UVic FASTA families;
- Multiple sequence alignment: CLUSTAL, HSSP, MSF, FASTA, PIR, MAF.

Output:
- HTML markup, FASTA, MSF, PIR, RDB (tab-separated values).

Found a bug? Please email biomview@gmail.com
